original_title: WIM Gold Award for Sampath Bank MD
original_body_lines: Sampath Bank has announcds that its Managing Director, Ayodhya Iddawela Perera, has been awarded the Gold Award at the 14th Top50 Professional & Career Women Global Awards 2024, recognising her outstanding contributions to Sri Lanka’s finance and banking sector.

Presented recently during the awards ceremony at the Sheraton Imperial Hotel in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, this accolade celebrates Mrs. Perera’s exemplary leadership and vision within the industry, marking a significant milestone in both her career and Sampath Bank’s journey.

Organised by Women in Management, the Top50 Global Awards recognises accomplished professionals from 29 countries, with Mrs. Perera distinguishing herself among 260 nominees. Her leadership in the banking sector, characterised by a commitment to innovation and positive change, is a testament to her dedication to advancing the industry. Each award is symbolised by a unique handcrafted trophy, made from dolomite crushed stones in Polonnaruwa, Sri Lanka, emphasising the award’s legacy and exclusivity.

Reflecting on this achievement, Managing Director of Sampath Bank, Ayodhya Iddawela Perera said, “It is an honour to be recognised alongside leaders shaping industries worldwide. This award acknowledges not just my journey, but the dedication and professionalism of the entire Sampath Bank team. Leadership, to me, is about empowering others, fostering growth, and creating impacts that extend into the communities we serve. This recognition strengthens my commitment to advancing these values within Sampath Bank and across the banking industry in Sri Lanka.”

This recognition reinforces Sampath Bank’s role as a leading force in Sri Lanka’s banking landscape, driven by a commitment to excellence and a dedication to setting new industry standards locally and globally.
